Package moteur

The package moteur containes the classes of Arbitre, Cards, CardsAJouer, CarteCouleur, CarteValeur, DrawDeck, InvalidNumberException, Jest, Observable, Offer, Player, PlayerReel, PlayerVirtuel, Stack, Trophie and Visitor. Being controlled by controller.GameController, these classes, enumerations, interfaces and exceptions run simultaniously to support the d√©roulement of the programme.
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Cards
    The interface Card contains two basic operations of a card, as they have in the real world : it has a value and a color.
    Visitor
    The interface Visitor is the implementation of the Design Pattern "Visitor", this D.P. allows adding new features, new methodes to existing class structure without need of many changes of the codes, by simply adding differnt strategy to "visit" and a new "visitor".
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Arbitre
    The interface Visitor is the implementation of the Design Pattern "Visitor".
    CardsAJouer
    The class CardsAJouer is in fact a Cards.
    DrawDeck
    The draw deck.
    Jest
    The class Jest is an agregation of cards, more specifically, is made up of CardsAJouer.
    Observable  
    Offer
    The class Offer is an agregation of cards, more specifically, is made up of CardsAJouer.
    Player
    This class is the class for a Player, in the game, a player should be able to act like a human, which is to say, choose a card to turn up or down at the begining of each turn, or choose the offer from another player, and also at the stage of calculating the points, player should accept the visitor who is the Arbitre to check the cards, so it containes the methode accept().
    PlayerReel
    The class PlayerReel is a player, so it extends Player, thus, a PlayerReel will take all of the attributs and methodes of its super class.
    PlayerVirtuel
    The class PlayerVirtual is also a player, so it extends Player, thus, a PlayerVirtual will take all of the attributs and methodes of its super class.
    Stack
    The class Stack is an agregation of crads, more specifically, is made up of CardsAJouer.
    Trophie
    Given the fact that every card has a "Orange Band" representing the type of the Trophie, we have sepreated that part, defining a type of Trophie.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    CarteCouleur
    This enumeration containes all of the colors of the cards.
    CarteValeur
    This enumeration containes all of the values of the cards.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidNumberException
    We created an Exception named after InvalidNumberException.
